item.title: The Semantic Web and Ontology
item.description: Glossary semantic web A proposed development of the World Wide Web in which data in web pages is structured and tagged in such a way that it can be read directly by computers. "the Semantic Web could usher in a golden age of information access" ontology [#metaphysics] [noun] A set of concepts and categories in a subject area or domain that shows their properties and the relations between them. "what's new about our ontology is that it is created automatically from large datasets" [#metaphysics] [field of study] The study of things, how they relate to other things, and what those things are called.
